attributes.additional_details:
Abolish this £145.00 POLL TAX.
A bloated company full of endless managers etc all earning £200,000 + salaries + expenses + car allowances etc.
Why do we always need 2 newsreaders?
Why send numerous journalists,cameramen etc to every corner of the world for a five to ten second film?
The size of salaries paid to its so called "stars"?
The list is endless. The waste is unbelievable, and we the public subsidize this behomoth of a company.
Impartiality is a joke, the reporting at times is verging on indoctrination.
